resources.string:
I am a skillful Android Engineer and Agriculturist with passion for promoting ICT adoption in the processes and operations of various industries; a creative thinker, keen on creating great mobile solutions to improve users' experience (businesses and customers alike). 
 
 Generally, I am interested in the way programming can be used to create sustainable solutions for various industries. I have taken trainings on Java and Android development and have developed some applications. I have worked as an ICT Consultant at Options Book and Information Services where I learnt, acquired and exchanged knowledge as regards Information and Communication Technology. I developed and equipped other members of staff with skills and processes which improved their level of performance and efficiency in their official day-to-day activities. I also worked as an Inventory/Database Administrator at First Synergi Homes Ltd. I have been involved in various capacity building activities while harnessing my communication, leadership, interpersonal and organizational skills. 
 
 I built the Inventory Monitoring Programme which is being used for the operations at Options Book and Information Services Ltd as well as First Synergi Homes Ltd. I have also practiced with a number of mobile applications which I hosted on GitHub.
